name: happy-hour-wanna-get-away-2
title: Happy Hour: Wanna Get Away?
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Fall colors will be at their peak in the Great Smoky Mountains in 12 days. That’s plenty of time to snag a cabin and plan yourselves a roadtrip. [WZTV] Attention, Apple fanboys and fangirls! The Green Hills Apple store is getting a $200,000 makeover. Let’s speculate. [WSMV] Coach Fisher says Vince Young is “day to day” with his sprained knee and ankle, so don’t yank him from your fantasy lineups just yet. [WKRN] The Metro Council will be voting on […]
contentEncoded:
• Fall colors will be at their peak in the Great Smoky Mountains in 12 days. That’s plenty of time to snag a cabin and plan yourselves a roadtrip. [WZTV]
  • Attention, Apple fanboys and fangirls! The Green Hills Apple store is getting a $200,000 makeover. Let’s speculate. [WSMV]
  • Coach Fisher says Vince Young is “day to day” with his sprained knee and ankle, so don’t yank him from your fantasy lineups just yet. [WKRN]
  • The Metro Council will be voting on the financing plan for the new convention center hotel at tonight’s meeting. [WTVF]
  • There is just not much good news today, so go stare at these bunnies in cups for a bit (Thanks for the pick-me-up, Codey!) [YouTube]

Photo by pr9000.
